snippet.title: Alan Wake 2: 11 Minutes of New Gameplay - IGN First
snippet.description:
IGN First for September is Remedy’s long-awaited Alan Wake 2. To kick things off we’ve got 11 minutes of brand new gameplay from an early mission played from the perspective of FBI Agent Saga Anderson. 

In the video, you’ll see a mixture of combat, puzzles, and detective work, as well as plenty of the series’ signature unsettling atmosphere as Saga arrives in the small town of Watery and through the Coffee World theme park. The town itself was founded by Finnish settlers who arrived in the American Pacific Northwest and may even be home to a familiar face to fans of Remedy’s other games…

Stay tuned all throughout the month as we’ll have plenty more gameplay and behind-the-scenes looks at Alan Wake 2 as we dive deeper into the Dark Place, Bright Falls, and everywhere in between.

#IGN #Gaming #AlanWake2
